item.title: Projects
item.author: andre@y7mail.com (André Almar)
item.description:
Some of the projects I’ve been working on:


Title: Stanford Crowd Course Initiative
Description: The Stanford Crowd Course Initiative is a program by Stanford researchers to facilitate people to share their knowledge with others, and exploring the possibility of collaborative teaching or course creation.
Where:
Stanford Python Course - You can find me on chapter 3.1 - Errors and Exceptions Technology stack used:
- Python

Title: Siebel - Restore Attachments
Description: This Python script, automates attachments recovery on Siebel CRM, decreasing CRM attachments recovery time by 90%.
Where:
Siebel restore attachments
Technology stack used:
- Python

Title: Livox - UX/UI Design
Description: UX/UI Design (proof of concept) for www.livox.com.br
Where: Livox

Title: Eventex
Description: Eventex is an Event Manager Web App
Where: Eventex | Github
Technology stack used:
- Python
- Django
- PostgreSQL
- Bootstrap
- Test Driven Development
- Heroku
- Sendgrid

Title: Punchstarter - Kickstarter clone
Description: This project involved developing a Python and Flask web application. This is a Kickstarter (kickstarter.com) clone made for study purposes.
Where:
Github
Technology stack used:
- Python
- Flask
- SQLite
- Materialize CSS

Title: CASEMG website
Description: Developed a new website for the Company saving 30k in costs of outsourcing and increasing in 60% the numbers of visitors in the first 3 months.
Where:
casemg.gov.br
Technology stack used:
- HTML
- CSS
- Javascript
- JQuery
